languages.text: "Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей — так и быть, я позволю тебе сохранить остатки достоинства. Это последний мой дар тебе, Маражай".

traits.locale_text: "Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей — так и быть, я позволю тебе сохранить остатки достоинства. Это последний мой дар тебе, Маражай".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."
languages.original_text: "Сложи оружие и ступай вслед за стражей — так и быть, я позволю тебе сохранить остатки достоинства. Это последний мой дар тебе, Маражай".

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “放下武器，跟着卫兵离开，我可以让你保留你早已所剩无几的尊严。这是我给你的最后一件礼物，玛拉斋。”
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: “放下武器，跟着卫兵离开，我可以让你保留你早已所剩无几的尊严。这是我给你的最后一件礼物，玛拉斋。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「武器を置いて衛兵の後を付いていけ。お前に残されたわずかな尊厳は守ってやろう。これが私からの最後の贈り物だ、マラズハイ」
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: 「武器を置いて衛兵の後を付いていけ。お前に残されたわずかな尊厳は守ってやろう。これが私からの最後の贈り物だ、マラズハイ」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «Suelta las armas y sigue a los guardias. Te dejaré conservar la poca dignidad que te queda. Ese es mi último regalo para ti, Marazhai».
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: «Suelta las armas y sigue a los guardias. Te dejaré conservar la poca dignidad que te queda. Ese es mi último regalo para ti, Marazhai».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Déposez vos armes et suivez les gardes. Je vous laisserai garder le peu de dignité qu'il vous reste. Ce sera mon ultime cadeau, Marazhai. »
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: « Déposez vos armes et suivez les gardes. Je vous laisserai garder le peu de dignité qu'il vous reste. Ce sera mon ultime cadeau, Marazhai. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder und folgt den Wachen. Den letzten Rest Eurer Würde will ich Euch lassen. Das ist mein letztes Geschenk an Euch, Marazhai."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder und folgt den Wachen. Den letzten Rest Eurer Würde will ich Euch lassen. Das ist mein letztes Geschenk an Euch, Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Silahlarını indirip muhafızları takip et. İçinde kalmış gurur zerrelerini senden söküp almama lütfunu göstereceğim. Sana son armağanım bu Marazhai."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and follow the guards. I will let you keep what little dignity you have left. This is my final gift to you, Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: "Silahlarını indir ve muhafızları takip et. İçinde kalmış gurur zerrelerini senden sökmeme lütfu göstereceğim. Sana son armağanım bu Marazhai."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
